nodes.text: The Fand sector was a sector located within the Outer Rim Territories of the galaxy. It contained the Isis system, which was the home star system of the Rebel Alliance safeworld Isis.

Jason Fry, co-author of The Essential Atlas, indicated that the Fand sector was excluded from The Essential Atlas Online Companion because later sources contradict its existence by placing Isis in the Anoat subsector of the Greater Javin sector.
